Posted By: Serev (2/16/2011 9:26:41 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Despite being in an artifact-heavy block, MBS has a ton of overcosted artifacts like this, myr turbine, phychosis crawler,knowledge pool and several others that do nothing impressive despite their mana cost.  
  
This is awful even in Limited, it's only playable if you're light on artifacts and your opponent is heavy on them, and your deck is aggressive and non-infect.   
  
Why do they make these kinds of cards, this card is useless in every situation, who on earth wants to open this in a booster?
posts.html:
Despite being in an artifact-heavy block, MBS has a ton of overcosted artifacts like this, myr turbine, phychosis crawler,knowledge pool and several others that do nothing impressive despite their mana cost.

This is awful even in Limited, it's only playable if you're light on artifacts and your opponent is heavy on them, and your deck is aggressive and non-infect.

Why do they make these kinds of cards, this card is useless in every situation, who on earth wants to open this in a booster?

posts.post_content: There are two major problems that I see with this card: 1) It's useless againt the enemy unless their deck happens to have a lot of artifacts in it. And you usually won't know that ahead of time. 2) If you ***do*** decide to use this card in one of your decks, you'd better not plan on using any other artifacts besides this one.
posts.html:
